const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "letter_unique_pos_example",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      analyzer: {
        letter_unique_pos: {
          tokenizer: "letter",
          filter: ["unique_pos"],
        },
      },
      filter: {
        unique_pos: {
          type: "unique",
          only_on_same_position: true,
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
